Methods_key3:
Hum programming language mein real life ko mirror karne ki kosish karte ha
in.
Methods_key4: Real life mein humare aas paas sab kuch ek **Object** hota hai. Aur har **object** ki kuch khasiyat hoti hai aur wah kuch kar sakta hai.
Methods_key5: Jaise, *spoon* ek real life object hai. *Spoon* se hum rice *pick* kar sakte hain.
Methods_key6: Aam bhasha mein agar hume spoon se rice pick karna hai toh hum aise kahenge
Methods_key7: Javacript ki bhasha mein hum isi ko aise kahenge:
Methods_key10: *pick()* ek **method** hai. Methods se hum kuch kaam karte hain.
Methods_key11: *"rice"* pick method ka argument hai. Arguments optional hote hain. Inke baare mein hum baad mein janenge
Methods_key12:
`Variables` jinme *number* ya *`string`* stored hain, wo bhi objects ki tarah hi kaam karte hain. Unke paas bhi kuch *methods* hote hain jo javascript mein pre-defined hain.
Inhe **Built-in Methods** bhi kehte hain.
Methods_key14: toUpperCase() method myName mein stored value ko ALL CAPS mein bana deta hai. Iska `output` "RAJEEV" hoga.
Methods_key15: Methods ka use karke hum `variables` mein stored values ko manipulate karte hain.
Methods_key16: ke baare mein aur janne ke liye aap
Methods_key19: bus numbers pe kaam karte hain aur
Methods_key23: Number methods toFixed() and to`String`() console pe try karke dekho. Yaad rahe ki ye methods number objects ke saath hi kaam karenge.
Methods_key24: `String` methods charAt() and length() console pe try karke dekho. Yaad rahe ki ye methods `string` objects ke saath hi kaam karenge.
